item.description:
We will be watching the DVD of the Chronicle program and then having a wonderful program about aquativity, a program so special that a whole chapter of our book, Edgar Cayce on the Indigo Children, was devoted to it! a

It is warm now, so the children can play outside. I hope to see you there!

Please bring a dish of food or a non-alcoholic beverage to share! Be ready for good food, good company and good conversation! Most who come are vegetarians.

For more information, see http://www.placeoflig...
item.name: The Worcester Indigo Children and Parents May Meetup
